title: Minidoka National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         People gathered for a Pilgrimage to Minidoka NHS. NPS  Minidoka National Historic Site wants you to stay connected to what's the latest happening in the park. We routinely update information on this website, in our news releases, and on Facebook.
